alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 10:20PM CDT until August 02 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Taylor County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1020 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Phillips to near Hawkins to 7 miles east of Ladysmith, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea and Westboro around 1050 PM CDT. Rib Lake around 1100 PM CDT. Medford around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wood Lake, North Twin Lake, The Mondeaux Flowage, Highway 13 And County Road M, County Roads D And N, Highway M And Joe Martin Road and Esadore Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
